content.description:
- Living in [Cascadia][1].
- Hacking on [Scuttlebutt](https://www.scuttlebutt.nz/).
- Working on software systems at [Fraction][2].
- Doing life with [Kathleen][4], [Jerome, and Sunshine][3]. 
- Tinkering with [@Current Events][6] and [@libra.fraction.io][5].
